sentence.Network_en: He looked back at the abject, silent girl and repeated his question.
sentence.Network_cn: 他转过头看着这个噤若寒蝉的女孩，又重复了一遍他的问题。

sentence.Network_en: With repeated applications of weedkiller, the weeds were overcome.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过反复施用除草剂，杂草得以彻底根除。

sentence.Network_en: During that time there have been repeated attempts to reintroduce capital punishment.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那段时期不断有人试图恢复死刑。

·事实错误：在一些场合中，无线电对讲使用了“重复”（repeat）。实际上在海军部队里，在无线电通信中用到“重复”这个单词，仅仅限于和炮兵连对话时，要求对方重复说一次.

entry.def: Repeated actions or events are ones which happen many times.

example.ex: Mr Lawssi apparently did not return the money, despite repeated reminders...
example.tran: 尽管被提醒了很多次，劳西先生显然没有把钱退回来。

example.ex: During that time there have been repeated attempts to reintroduce capital punishment.
example.tran: 在那段时期不断有人试图恢复死刑。

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Japanese foreign minister repeated that apology on Sunday.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的

Sentence.sentence: They're willing to do the hard work of identifying their valuable skills; be creative about where and how to look; learn how to present themselves to potential employers; and keep going, even after repeated rejections.
Disputes were characterized by intense verbal ( 言语上的) aggression, tended to be repeated and not resolved and made men, more than women, extremely angry.

sentences.en: Jones was ordered off in the second half after repeated fouls.
sentences.cn: 由于屡次犯规,琼斯在下半场中被责令退出比赛。

sentences.en: After repeated education they still refused to correct their errors.
sentences.cn: 经过反复教育,他们仍拒不改正错误。

sentences.en: After repeated attempts they finally succeeded.
sentences.cn: 经过反复尝试,他们终于成功了。
